p: Proanthocyanidins concentration was determined according to the method described by Waterman and Mole [ 49]. Butanol reagent was prepared by mixing 70 mg ferrous sulphate (FeSO 4) with 5 mL concentrated HCl and made to 100 mL with n-butanol. The extract (0.1 mL) was mixed with 1.4 mL of butanol reagent. The mixture was heated at 95 Â°C in a water bath for 45 min. The mixture was then cooled, 0.5 mL n-butanol was added and the absorbance was measured at 550 nm. Results were expressed as cyanidin equivalents (CYE) per g of DM.
